typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select * from dwh_stage.p_lcctable',
	format: 'query') ~> lcctable
lcctable alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		pk_pre_dim_claim_team as string,
		date_inserted as timestamp,
		last_updated_by as string,
		inserted_by as string,
		emp_id_main_adjuster as decimal(28,10),
		tem_description as string,
		sign_lcacrsign as string,
		date_last_updated as timestamp,
		tem_key as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
